message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $100
